<?php
/**
 * Customer.php defines a class that builds a customer service data object.
 *
 * {license_notice}
 *
 * @copyright {copyright}
 * @license {license}
 */
namespace Magento\Customer\Service\V1\Data;

/**
 * Class Customer
 */
class Customer extends \Magento\Framework\Service\Data\Eav\AbstractObject
{
    /**
     * Customer ID.
     */
    const ID = 'id';
    /**
     * Confirmation.
     */
    const CONFIRMATION = 'confirmation';
    /**
     * Created at.
     */
    const CREATED_AT = 'created_at';
    /**
     * Created in.
     */
    const CREATED_IN = 'created_in';
    /**
     * Date of birth.
     */
    const DOB = 'dob';
    /**
     * Email.
     */
    const EMAIL = 'email';
    /**
     * First name.
     */
    const FIRSTNAME = 'firstname';
    /**
     * Gender.
     */
    const GENDER = 'gender';
    /**
     * Group ID.
     */
    const GROUP_ID = 'group_id';
    /**
     * Last name.
     */
    const LASTNAME = 'lastname';
    /**
     * Middle name.
     */
    const MIDDLENAME = 'middlename';
    /**
     * Prefix.
     */
    const PREFIX = 'prefix';
    /**
     * Store ID.
     */
    const STORE_ID = 'store_id';
    /**
     * Suffix.
     */
    const SUFFIX = 'suffix';
    /**
     * Tax Vat.
     */
    const TAXVAT = 'taxvat';
    /**
     * Website ID.
     */
    const WEBSITE_ID = 'website_id';
    /**
     * Default billing address.
     */
    const DEFAULT_BILLING = 'default_billing';
    /**
     * Default shipping address.
     */
    const DEFAULT_SHIPPING = 'default_shipping';

    /**#@-*/

    /**
     * Gets the default billing address.
     * 
     * @return string|null The default billing address or null.
     */
    public function getDefaultBilling()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::DEFAULT_BILLING);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the default shipping address.
     *
     * @return string|null The default shipping address or null.
     */
    public function getDefaultShipping()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::DEFAULT_SHIPPING);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the confirmation value.
     *
     * @return string|null The confirmation value or null.
     */
    public function getConfirmation()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::CONFIRMATION);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the created at time.
     *
     * @return string|null The created at time or null.
     */
    public function getCreatedAt()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::CREATED_AT);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the created in area.
     *
     * @return string|null The created in area or null.
     */
    public function getCreatedIn()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::CREATED_IN);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the date of birth.
     *
     * @return string|null The date of birth or null.
     */
    public function getDob()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::DOB);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the email address.
     *
     * @return string The email address or null.
     */
    public function getEmail()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::EMAIL);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the first name.
     *
     * @return string The first name or null.
     */
    public function getFirstname()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::FIRSTNAME);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the gender.
     *
     * @return string|null The gender or null.
     */
    public function getGender()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::GENDER);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the group ID.
     *
     * @return string|null The group ID or null.
     */
    public function getGroupId()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::GROUP_ID);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the customer ID.
     *
     * @return int|null The customer ID or null.
     */
    public function getId()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::ID);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the last name.
     *
     * @return string The last name or null.
     */
    public function getLastname()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::LASTNAME);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the middle name.
     *
     * @return string|null The middle name or null.
     */
    public function getMiddlename()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::MIDDLENAME);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the prefix.
     *
     * @return string|null The prefix or null.
     */
    public function getPrefix()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::PREFIX);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the store ID.
     *
     * @return int|null The store ID or null.
     */
    public function getStoreId()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::STORE_ID);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the suffix.
     *
     * @return string|null The suffix or null.
     */
    public function getSuffix()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::SUFFIX);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the value-added tax (VAT).
     *
     * @return string|null The value-added tax (VAT) or null.
     */
    public function getTaxvat()
    {
        return $this->_get(self::TAXVAT);
    }

    /**
     * Gets the website ID.
     *
     * @return int|null The website ID or null.
     */
    public function getWebsiteId()
    {
        return (int)$this->_get(self::WEBSITE_ID);
    }
}
